Content:: George Jonathan Dodo (17 August 1956 – 8 July 2022) was a Nigerian Roman Catholic prelate. Dodo was born in Nigeria and was ordained to the priesthood in 1983. He served as the bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Zaria, Nigeria, from 2000 until his death in 2022.[1]  This article about a Catholic bishop is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
